pageContext.title: Lost Dog (w/Lost Abbey)
pageContext.tagline: Rum-Aged Imperial Porter - Lost Abbey Collab.
pageContext.description: Our first beer aged in rum casks, Lost Dog saw us brew a collaboration imperial porter with our friends at Lost Abbey. The base beer was packed with toffee, chocolate and roasty notes, balanced with a subtle spicy hop character. The rum casks add a warming, spiced vanilla edge.
pageContext.author: Sam Mason <samjbmason>
